page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content:
INTRODUCTION
The block where we live is found in the heart of the Highlands of Scotland. The area is made up mainly of forest and moorland, but most people live in the lower land of the Spey Valley. The river itself lies just outside our block but dominates much of the life within the block. Most of the people in the area live in Grantown-on-Spey, a town of about two thousand people. The northern third of the town is contained in our block.
Grantown-on-Spey lies on the A95 road about 22km north of Aviemore. It is close to the A9 which leads to Inverness, the 'Capital' of the Highlands, about 55km away. Grantown is also 55km from the Cathedral town of Elgin.
